channel.title: CVE Feed for ICS-CERT -- Omron CX-Supervisor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ICS-CERT -- Omron CX-Supervisor

item.title: CVE-2018-7525|2024-08-05T06:31:04.350Z -- ics-cert -- omron%20cx-supervisor
item.description: In Omron CX-Supervisor Versions 3.30 and prior, processing a malformed packet by a certain executable may cause an untrusted pointer dereference vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2018-7513|2024-08-05T06:31:04.267Z -- ics-cert -- omron%20cx-supervisor
item.description: In Omron CX-Supervisor Versions 3.30 and prior, parsing malformed project files may cause a stack-based buffer overflow.

item.title: CVE-2018-7517|2024-08-05T06:31:04.083Z -- ics-cert -- omron%20cx-supervisor
item.description: In Omron CX-Supervisor Versions 3.30 and prior, parsing malformed project files may cause an out of bounds vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2018-7519|2024-08-05T06:31:04.264Z -- ics-cert -- omron%20cx-supervisor
item.description: In Omron CX-Supervisor Versions 3.30 and prior, parsing malformed project files may cause a heap-based buffer overflow.

item.title: CVE-2018-7523|2024-08-05T06:31:03.693Z -- ics-cert -- omron%20cx-supervisor
item.description: In Omron CX-Supervisor Versions 3.30 and prior, parsing malformed project files may cause a double free vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2018-7521|2024-08-05T06:31:03.908Z -- ics-cert -- omron%20cx-supervisor
item.description: In Omron CX-Supervisor Versions 3.30 and prior, use after free vulnerabilities can be exploited when CX Supervisor parses a specially crafted project file.
